channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Ok: Im new using moparscape so I got lots of things to ask. I have read many guides but I can't do them.
I got moparscape 3.1
I cant update my server. When Im go to moparscape file > Hybirdscape > npc and I press edit and I trying to get npc:s hps right. When I write npc 1 man healt 900 and I save and i do man in moparscape it healt isnt 900. Its still 0/0. Why?
Same thing at updating other things. It dont save or something.
AND when Im downloading cheezscapes and other scapes they don't start. There is only: Port 43245 I dont remember it. Why?
Ok Im noob but I have tryed fix that hit updating. But I haven't player.java file? It didn't come in moparscapae. OH THERE IT IS! I found it right now, ok forget this. Or not I have problem again. In guide reads And under appendPlayerUpdateBlock change if(hitUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 0x20; to if(hitUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 0x200;
where I need to go to do that?
: I need that cript or something to open doors and go in castle wars, pull on switches pls. and I need more info to hitupdgrading pls.
Lol I realy need help :D Ty if u help.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @grayza5 grayza5

how do i start playing

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Mippo Mippo
item.description:
@Mippo wrote:

Ok: Im new using moparscape so I got lots of things to ask. I have read many guides but I can’t do them.

I got moparscape 3.1

I cant update my server. When Im go to moparscape file > Hybirdscape > npc and I press edit and I trying to get npc:s hps right. When I write npc 1 man healt 900 and I save and i do man in moparscape it healt isnt 900. Its still 0/0. Why?

Same thing at updating other things. It dont save or something.

AND when Im downloading cheezscapes and other scapes they don’t start. There is only: Port 43245
I dont remember it. Why?

Ok Im noob but I have tryed fix that hit updating. But I haven’t player.java file? It didn’t come in moparscapae. OH THERE IT IS! I found it right now, ok forget this. Or not I have problem again. In guide reads
And under appendPlayerUpdateBlock change if(hitUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 0x20; to if(hitUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 0x200;

where I need to go to do that?

: I need that cript or something to open doors and go in castle wars, pull on switches pls.
and I need more info to hitupdgrading pls.

Lol I realy need help Ty if u help.

Read full topic
